title: Iridium complex modified MOFs for enhancing photocatalytic hydrogen evolution

In this paper, we prepared an iridium(III) complex modified MOF (cmrIr/Pt@UiO-66-NH2) to combine the excellent light absorption properties of iridium(III) complexes and good photostability of metal-organic frameworks (MOF). Photocatalytic tests...
